2164.subject: MPA
2164.descrlong:
Analogue Mixing and Digital Editing:  This course builds on the knowledge acquired in through MPA 306 and 307.  Students will study advanced analogue mixing on the MTA 980.  Analogue signal routing, inserts, auxiliary sends, equalization, sub-mixing and signal processing principles will be combined with advanced digital production and editing within Pro Tools.   (Offered fall semester.)

[Prereq: (MPA 306 and MPA 307) and Instructor Consent]
